product_name: Sierra Designs Mobile Mummy 2.5-Season Sleeping Bag - Women's
long_description: It's a sleeping bag that can be worn like a jacket. This convertible sleeping bag is designed to move with you so you can sleep in any position you like. And, you can wear it as a jacket around camp.
short_description: It's a sleeping bag that can be worn like a jacket. This convertible sleeping bag is designed to move with you so you can sleep in any position you like. And, you can wear it as a jacket around camp.
